original_title: UFC Fight Night 68: Boetsch vs. Henderson
overview: UFC Fight Night 68: Boetsch vs. Henderson was a mixed martial arts event held on June 6, 2015, at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, Louisiana. A middleweight bout between Tim Boetsch and mixed martial arts legend Dan Henderson was the main event.
title: UFC Fight Night 68: Boetsch vs. Henderson
